name: Peers and Peers Website
tagline: We implement the tools for a peer to peer economy
body:
### The Company
Peers and Peers ideates, design and implements web and mobile application for the peer to peer economy. We are convinced a connected economy, with as few middlemen as possible, is a better economy.

### Team, Contributors, Advisors
We are working with talented developers, designers, and thinkers.
- Founder: Quentin Decock (@qdecock)

### Contact Us
If you have a project related to the "peer to peer"/sharing economy feel free to reach out to us.
